summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Dubai SR e-commerce platform. All backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend UI fully functional with minor responsive design considerations. Cart, checkout, coupon system, and admin login all working correctly.

design_issues.issue: Mobile filter button is hidden on desktop view (expected behavior)

passed_tests: Database seeding with 4 categories and 8 products
Category endpoints - Get all categories and individual category
Product endpoints - Get products, by ID, by slug, with filters
Brand endpoints - Get all unique brands
Cart operations - Add, update, remove items
Coupon validation - WELCOME10 (10% off) and FLAT500 (â‚¹500 off)
Order creation with COD payment method
Homepage hero section, categories, featured products, testimonials
Shop page with filters (category, brand, new arrivals, sale)
Product detail page with size selection and add to cart
Cart page with quantity controls and coupon application
Checkout page with shipping form and payment method selection
WhatsApp floating button with correct number (918595371004)
Mobile responsiveness - filter button visible on mobile
All navigation and UI interactions working smoothly
